assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Nadeem Qureshi is a member of the NICE Guideline Development Group for Familial Breast Cancer and the Advisory Board for Journal of Community Genetics. Siang Ing Lee, Mitesh Patel, Brittany Dutton, Stephen Weng and Jocelyn Luveta declare no conflict of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This article does not contain any studies with human participants or animals performed by any of the authors.
